ec2AutoScaling.name: Implemented Auto Scaling the EC2 Instance-Based on Monitored CloudWatch Metrics.
ec2AutoScaling.description: Implemented Auto Scaling and utilized AWS services such as CloudWatch, Auto Scaling, and EC2 to manage resources dynamically based on monitored metrics. Captured and analyzed CloudWatch metrics to ensure efficient cost management and optimized AWS resources. Experienced in implementing and configuring AMIs to automate software/application installation and configuration for added EC2 instances.

ServerlessWeb.name: Architecting a feedback website using Serverless Technology.
ServerlessWeb.description: I architected a feedback website using serverless technology and AWS services such as S3, DynamoDB, Cognito, and IAM. The feedback form was designed to collect customer feedback, which was stored in DynamoDB for further analysis. The website's authentication was implemented using Cognito to allow for user signup and login. By leveraging serverless technology, I eliminated the need for managing servers and allowed the cloud provider to automatically manage capacity planning, scaling, high availability, and fault tolerance.

phishEye.name: phishEye
phishEye.description: phishEye is a PHISHING tool in PYTHON. It Includes popular websites like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, GitHub, Dropbox, and many others. Created with FLASK and custom templates and tunneled multiple services. Article on phishEye, written by me:- https://sky9262.tistory.com/5

winLock.name: winLock
winLock.description:
Developed a Python script using the Tkinter module that creates a graphical user interface allowing users to lock and unlock folders with a password. 
This script utilizes various modules such as filedialog, win32com.client, subprocess, os, and pythoncom to create and manage locked folders. The GUI also displays a list of locked folders as clickable buttons for an easy way to remove the lock.

gce-korea.name: Gce-Korea
gce-korea.description:
A MERN stack project.This website is dedicated to "GitHub Campus Expert - Korea". Created with REACT JS.
API created using NODE JS and hosted on Render.
Database hosted on Mongodb atlas.
- Sign in & Sign up
- sha256 encryption
- sha256 decryption.

Preview: https://sky9262.github.io/gce-korea/
gce-korea.stacks: React Js, MongoDB, Express Js, Node Js, Bootstrap
